Packages that use XhiveException
com.xhive.dom.xlink.interfaces This package contains W3C XLink convenience classes: (1) a utility class with basic link-resolution, link-expansion and link-management functions (2) a DOM XLink API where users can retrieve XLink information from DOM nodes. 
com.xhive.error This package holds the XhiveException class.

Subclasses of XhiveException in com.xhive.error
 class XhiveDeadlockException
          Exception to indicate that a deadlock occurred while attempting to acquire a lock on a database object.
 class XhiveInterruptedException
          Exception to indicate that a database operation was interrupted using XhiveSessionIf.interrupt().
 class XhiveLockNotGrantedException
